subject: Re: [junit] Suggestion: New addition to the Assert class
msgSnippet: What is it that you like about this approach vs just having your test methods throw Exception? -Kevin ... __________________________________________________ Do
messageBody:
What is it that you like about this approach vs just having your test
methods throw Exception?

-Kevin
--- "andy_ipaccess <andrew.mcdonagh@...>"
<andrew.mcdonagh@...> wrote:
> Most of my tests have a catch all, catch block, which simplay calls
> fail(e.toString());
>
> Can i suggest that the following fail() method be added for the next
> release.
>
>
> /**
> * Fails a test with the given message.
> */
> static public void fail(Exception e) {
> throw new AssertionFailedError(e.toString());
> }
>
> Seems to make the code cleaner, my 2cents
>
> Andy
>
